Incentives.title: Incentives That Drive Culture and Results
Incentives.content: Most companies want to recognize and reward their employees. But too often, it's an afterthought—an email, a gift card, or a generic bonus. That’s not what people remember. Perkflow gives your team something better: a real reason to stay motivated, to feel valued, and to keep aiming higher. We help you build a system where performance is recognized in real time, with experiences that inspire, and tools that simplify everything.

Purpose.heading: One Platform, Endless Possibilities
Purpose.subheading: Turn any milestone into a moment worth celebrating.

card1.title: Create Clear, Meaningful Goals
card1.content: Set individual or team targets, like hitting a sales number, launching a new project, or completing onboarding. Every goal can be tracked, timed, and labeled with custom tags (like #Q4closed or #LevelUpWeek).

card2.title: Track Progress with Visibility for All
card2.content: Everyone sees where they stand. Progress bars, deadlines, and live updates keep teams aligned and focused, without needing to chase updates or send reminders.

card3.title: Unlock Rewards That Feel Personal
card3.content: When a goal is reached, Perkflow notifies the team and unlocks a pre-set reward, like a trip, a curated experience, or something your company defines. You can even let employees vote on their reward.

Objectives.heading: Built for Companies That Care About Culture

card1.title: It Motivates Without Micromanaging
card1.content: Employees are given something real to work toward. You set the challenge, and the system handles the rest. You don't need to follow up, they can see their own progress.

card2.title: It Makes Recognition Consistent, Not Random
card2.content: Instead of saving recognition for annual reviews or end-of-year bonuses, you can create a culture of regular, earned recognition.

card3.title: It Supports Everyone, from HR to People Ops
card3.content: Whether you're planning a team incentive, welcoming new hires, or re-engaging a remote department, Perkflow helps each team use rewards as a tool for real impact.

card1.title: Clarity
card1.content: Easy setup. No confusion. You're in control of your reward rules and structure.

card2.title: Flexibility
card2.content: Set rewards for individuals, teams, departments, or company-wide initiatives.

card3.title: Scalability
card3.content: Start with one use case, grow to multiple. It works whether you have 20 or 2,000 people.

card4.title: Security & Reliability
card4.content: We support SSO, role-based access, GDPR compliance, and secure data storage.
